creator: fhanik@apache.org
text:
The underlying library chosen for ANT SCP task has a bug, where it hangs on
transfer of large amount of files.
I have created a patch which allows the SCP command to be resent each X number
of files transferred. This minimizes the risk of the library hanging.

For future, maybe MindBright is a better library.

<scp fileBatchSize="25"
     ......>

</scp>

PS. I will attach the patch, when I find the attach button :)
